education.description: Taking online classes part time on evenings and weekends.  Classes so far include: Web Dev I, Java, SQL , I.T. Fundamentals, Object Oriented Programming, Project Management, Web Dev II.
Received the Convocation Award for having the top overall average in my graduating class.  There is at least some chance that I was the only person in my graduating class.
